items.name: Bridal Veil Falls
items.description: A stunning 607-foot waterfall offering scenic views and hiking opportunities.

items.name: Provo City Library at Academy Square
items.description: A historic library offering extensive collections, programs, and community events.

items.name: Provo Pioneer Village
items.description: A preserved 19th-century village showcasing pioneer-era buildings and artifacts.

items.name: The Shops at Riverwoods
items.description: An outdoor shopping center featuring boutiques, restaurants, and entertainment.

items.name: Provo City Center Temple
items.description: A historic LDS temple with stunning architecture and beautifully landscaped grounds.

items.name: Crandall Historical Printing Museum
items.description: A museum dedicated to the history of printing, featuring working presses and exhibits.

items.name: Seven Peaks Water Park
items.description: A family-friendly water park with slides, a lazy river, and wave pools.

items.name: Provo River Parkway Trail
items.description: A scenic trail for walking, jogging, and biking along the Provo River.

items.name: BYU Museum of Art
items.description: A museum showcasing a diverse collection of art from various periods and cultures.

items.name: Rock Canyon Trail
items.description: A popular hiking trail offering stunning views of the canyon and surrounding areas.
